title: make.bash: build fails with go1.4rc2 by liblink/anames9.c
body:
# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool for host, darwin/amd64.
lib9
libbio
liblink
/usr/local/go/src/liblink/anames9.c:6:10: fatal error: '../cmd/9l/9.out.h' file not found
go tool dist: FAILED: clang -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -Wextra -Wunused -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-missing-braces -Wno-parentheses -Wno-unknown-pragmas -Wno-switch -Wno-comment -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Werror -fno-common -ggdb -pipe -Wuninitialized -O2 -fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments -fmessage-length=0 -mmacosx-version-min=10.6 -c -m64 -I /usr/local/go/include -I /usr/local/go/src/liblink -o /usr/local/go/pkg/obj/liblink/anames9.o /usr/local/go/src/liblink/anames9.c
